attributes.action: stop all immigration to this country and repatriate all illigal immigrents back to their own country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: basicaly to close the borders and start rooting out all illegals send them home not give them permits to stay this country is now overloaded

rejection.details: There are already a number of similar petitions. http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Immigrant-Influx/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
